subject: Football
Sex Crimes
lead_paragraph: The former N.F.L. star Darren Sharper pleaded guilty to a reduced felony attempted sexual assault charge in Las Vegas, in the third part of a four-state plea deal.
snippet: The former N.F.L. star Darren Sharper pleaded guilty to a reduced felony attempted sexual assault charge in Las Vegas, in the third part of a four-state plea deal.
